readme:
# project-environment

Instant tree view setup for multiple repository projects. Go from left to right instantly after opening a folder.

![Go from this](https://s3.amazonaws.com/f.cl.ly/items/1L3i1s0m3s2v172e1L2x/Screen%20Shot%202015-12-17%20at%2014.01.52.png?v=a0b0d7dc) ![To this](https://s3.amazonaws.com/f.cl.ly/items/0b0T2s462c2z2g3g2K2U/Screen%20Shot%202015-12-17%20at%2014.02.49.png?v=a0b0d7dc)

## Setup

Create a file `.atomenv` in any folder, in which you declare paths you'd like in your tree view.

Assume I have a folder structure like this:

```
big-project/
    - client/
    - server/
    - static/
    - data/
        - images/
        - js/
    - .atomenv
```

The `.atomenv` would contain, assuming I want to work with `client` and `server` (in order of appearance):

```
client
server
data/js
```
